kusura bakmanda csgo oynayani sikeyim Cs 1.6 ile condtion zero adamdir

Ahh, what a breeze that was.
A lot of people don't know what's different between this game and CS 1.6, the key is that this one is the latter on sterodes, slightly better graphics, definitely better vocals, and more balanced gameplay, plus a shocking but welcoming campaign mode. What is that you say? A bunch of missions that you have to complete alongside checking all of the side tasks required to pass each mission, a fun a and challending process none the less.
This is what CS 1.6 should have been. But still, that one has the nostalgic element to it.

I love playing single player creations in the goldsource engine, since I grew up on Half-life, but condition zero deleted scenes was pretty awful. I can't believe people actually got paid money to create such a shoddy product. Sure the maps were very well done and the art direction was pretty reasonable considering the tools they had to work with...but the rest was way too cringe-inducing to make up for it. The voice actors, for example, have the most cheesy accents for whatever region of the globe the mission is in. the IRA is my personal worst favorite, followed by the Ruskis in a close second. The training mission was more basic than the one in Half-Life. The gameplay was very predictable, with all the enemies showing up exactly where you expect them to. I'm almost glad Valve put a stop to the project and gave it to another studio, to finish up a proper update to the original CS. If CS:Source hadn't come out shortly after this, Valve would've been a laughing stock.

That said, I very much enjoyed the maps and the art, and the comedy provided by the crap voice acting was enough to make me lol. Would recommend to anyone who likes playing in goldsource.

This game uses GoldSrc and it came out 2004. I won't be talking about Condition Zero Deleted Scenes because I haven't played it too much, but eh. Anyway, Condition Zero is the same thing as the first Counter-Strike, just with missions. I won't talk about the multiplayer mode this time but I will talk about the missions.

The missions are simple, do 2-4 tasks and some of them are actually pretty hard, like, kill 2 enemies with the sniper rifle. I usually always get it but the enemy AI always is hard, no matter what you change it to.

The maps and guns are all the same. So there isn't much to speak about.

Final score: 50% 

I didn't mention multiplayer because it is bad. People cheat, VAC is broken. Also the missions are extremely messed up so this game is pretty much unplayable, it works at some points which is mostly going to happen but it really doesn't do it too much.
